title: ADOS Testing
shortDescription: Gold standard diagnostic assessment for autism spectrum disorder.
description: The Autism Diagnostic Observation Schedule (ADOS-2) is considered the gold standard assessment tool for diagnosing autism spectrum disorder. Administered by trained clinicians, ADOS involves structured activities and conversations that allow the evaluator to observe social interaction, communication, play, and restricted/repetitive behaviors. ADOS is typically part of a comprehensive diagnostic evaluation that may also include developmental history, cognitive testing, and other assessments.
benefits: Required for many services and funding
whoCanBenefit: Those needing formal diagnosis for services
